when we were looking for a technology

the AWS Cloud environment enabled us to

critical information security

president of technology and solutions

focused solely on content security for

architecting deep security as a service
we knew we needed a tech technology

possible to our customers deep security
is a service is really two components
there's a manager component that we run
for you and deep security agents that
need to run on your ec2 instances what
we've done has made it very simple and
easy to deploy those agents to provide
highlevel Advanced controls for your ec2
instances by architecting on the AWS
Cloud we've been able to reduce our

customers are benefiting from us
choosing to deploy deep Securities of

able to provide a highly available
environment in fact we've been able to
maintain five nines of uptime which
really helps our customers enforce their
security we use Route 53 for our domain
name Services we use ec2 for our
Computing instances we have storage in
S3 and we use RDS for our data uh data

we've received answers to our questions
